=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: short bob human hair wigs lace front human hair wigs straight bob wigs natural color
Review Date: 2020/01/31
Store: aibasi
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Brand': 'Aibasi', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '10.8 x 6.8 x 3 inches; 11.99 Ounces', 'UPC': '733810686330'}
Review Text: I'm always nervous about ordering human hair wigs through Amazon because you never know what you're going to get but this one was nice. I've been thinking about cutting my actual hair into an angled bob but wanted to test run the length first. So I got this wig and I love how it looks. I also love that I was able to lightly bleach highlights into the wig and the hair took it easily. So the quality on this wig is great.
Review Title: Great quality wig with very soft hair
Rating: 5.0

My husband is ALWAYS trying to "borrow" pieces from my manicure kit. In particular, he always tries to take my cuticle nippers and nail clippers — and then doesn't put them back. So, then when I need them, I can't find them...not cool. So I'm giving him this as one of his many Christmas gifts because I'm tired of chasing him for my stuff. He'll say he doesn't need it...but he does!

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Gifting Preferences:** Values practical gifts for men, particularly those that address everyday needs or convenience, while showing a growing interest in personal care and grooming products. This includes an inclination towards gifts that serve dual purposes, merging functionality with personal relevance. 

- **Target Audience:** Primarily focused on male recipients, especially partners or fathers, but has expanded to include interests in personal grooming and beauty items, indicating a broader consideration for diverse gifting options.

- **Materials Selection:** Prefers durable and high-quality materials, like stainless steel, alongside an emerging appreciation for softness and comfort in personal care items as evidenced by recent interactions with beauty products.

- **Personal Insights:** Takes a thoughtful approach to gift-giving, seeking solutions to common issues while being mindful of the recipient’s lifestyle. The user demonstrates a commitment to selecting high-quality and effective items for personal use and those they care about.

- **Occasion Awareness:** Engages in major gifting occasions, such as Christmas and Father’s Day, and is increasingly aware of gifts that enhance personal care and self-improvement, indicating an evolved perspective on gifting opportunities.

Overall, the user focuses on meaningful, practical gifts that enhance daily life, reflecting a nurturing and considerate gifting style, with an expanding interest in personal care and grooming options.
